videoTitle: The Sharks Fight Over Unique Toy Business ｜ Shark Tank US ｜ Shark Tank Global

transcript.text: First into the tank is Nikki Pope with a
money-saving idea to help parents
entertain their kids.
I'm Nikki Pope. I live in Los Angeles,
California, and my company is Toy Guru.
Look what I have.
Yay.
I have 13 nieces and nephews, and they
absolutely love playing with toys. I
call them my playtime professionals. The
problem is they get bored with those
toys really quickly. That is what
inspired me and my husband to create Toy
Guru. Toy Guru offers a coste effective
way not only for parents to declutter
their homes, but to keep their kids
challenged and entertained. My husband
and I don't have any kids yet, but we
would definitely like to. And an
investment from the Sharks would mean
that we would have the stability we need
to start a family of our own. My dream
for my company is that every family who
has children who love to play with toys
will use Toy Guru. And I really hope the
sharks will help make that happen.
[Music]
[Music]
Hi guys, my name is Nikki. My company is
Toy Guru and I am asking for $100,000 in
exchange for 10% of my company. Toy Guru
solves a problem that millions of
families face every day. I have 11

thing that I've noticed is that my
siblings are purchasing toy after toy

left completely untouched. Toy Guru
solves that problem and more. My company
is the Netflix for toys. Consumers can

with toys that they would like to
receive, and I ship those toys right to

label that we provided, send them back
to us, and we send them their next box
of toys.

Absolutely.
And how many toys are in your catalog?
We have over 300 different types of

sanitized.

and we shrink wrap it every time.
